Disabled: Setting to true disables the module
EnableUploadSizeLimit: If true, upload file size limit is set
UploadSizeLimitMb: Upload file size limit value, in Mbytes
UserSpaceLimitMb: Default filestorage disk space quota for new user accounts created
TenantSpaceLimitMb: With multitenancy enabled, default tenant space quota; with multitenancy disabled, total disk space quota for the installation
CustomTabTitle: The value will be used as the tab title in the web UI
